Horrible looking skins imho.
I believe many developers have put a tonne of time, effort, planning etc into creating these skins. Plus many people really like it and want to buy it. Show some respect please...

To be fair, freedom of speech is a thing, can't oppress that shit mang. 
It's up to the Dev team weather or not they want to take offence to it, they are trying to cater to an immense audience, it's obvious some won't be giving positive feed back.

Yes, clearly the guy that wrote the is very intelligent. So I doubt they would take any offence. However, I don't recall telling him that he could not speak. I was just saying what he was saying is sorta rude and not overly necessary. I don't know why you felt the need to talk about freedom of speech, was it to sound smart? That didn't overly work for you ;). Heh. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

"Show some respect please" 
freedom of speech allows you to say what you want, if you wish to use that to show something that isn't "Respectful" other people don't have the right to try and force someone to be respectful, it's not up to you weather it's a respectful comment or not, you're trying to force your opinion onto someone else's comment.
By asking him to "Show some respect" you're basically saying "No, don't voice your opinion." because it's not the opinion you want to hear.

TIME AND EFFORT? Fuck me dude, if everyone could put time and effort into something and have it work we might all be millionaires. You can put time and effort into anything but that doesn't guarantee it being a success. For example a singer with no hint of talent putting in years of practice; no one is actually going to buy and listen to their songs (unless they're so bad they become a parody). It actually has to be appealing to a potential buyer and if these skins aren't appealing then that's their fault for releasing them in this state.
Have you not heard Katy Perry live?
Yo he's aloud his opinion
